member.name: T:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption
member.summary: Utility class for doing RSA Encryption

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.param: Input string (should be small as anything over 128 bytes can not be decrypted)
Key to use for encryption
Encoding that the input string uses (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.param: Input string (should be small as anything over 128 bytes can not be decrypted)
Key to use for decryption
Encoding that the result should use (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption.CreateKey(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new set of keys
member.param: True if private key should be included, false otherwise
member.returns: XML representation of the key information

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption.SignHash(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Takes a string and creates a signed hash of it
member.param: Input string
Key to encrypt/sign with
This will be filled with the unsigned hash
Encoding that the input is using (defaults to UTF8)
member.returns: A signed hash of the input (64bit string)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.RSAEncryption.VerifyHash(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies a signed hash against the unsigned version
member.param: The unsigned hash (should be 64bit string)
The signed hash (should be 64bit string)
The key to use in decryption
member.returns: True if it is verified, false otherwise

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.SymmetricExtensions.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Text to be encrypted
Password to encrypt with
Algorithm to use for encryption (defaults to AES)
Salt to encrypt with
Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Number of iterations to do
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
Encoding that the original string is using (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.SymmetricExtensions.Encrypt(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes,System.Text.Encoding,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Data to encrypt
Key to use to encrypt the data (can use PasswordDeriveBytes, Rfc2898DeriveBytes, etc. Really anything that implements DeriveBytes)
Algorithm to use for encryption (defaults to AES)
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)
Encoding that the original string is using (defaults to UTF8)

Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)

member.param: Text to be decrypted (Base 64 string)
Key to use to encrypt the data (can use PasswordDeriveBytes, Rfc2898DeriveBytes, etc. Really anything that implements DeriveBytes)
Encoding that the output string should use (defaults to UTF8)
Algorithm to use for decryption (defaults to AES)
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)

Salt to decrypt with
Can be either SHA1 or MD5
Number of iterations to do
Needs to be 16 ASCII characters long
Can be 64 (DES only), 128 (AES), 192 (AES and Triple DES), or 256 (AES)

Size of the salt byte array

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.HashExtensions.Hash(System.Byte[],System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm)
member.summary: Computes the hash of a byte array
member.param: Byte array to hash
Hash algorithm to use (defaults to SHA1)
member.returns: The hash of the byte array

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.HashExtensions.Hash(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Computes the hash of a string
member.param: string to hash
Algorithm to use (defaults to SHA1)
Encoding used by the string (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: T:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions
member.summary: Extensions that deal with bit xoring

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Data to encrypt
Key to use
Is this a one time pad?

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Encrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Data to encrypt
Key to use
Is this a one time pad?
Encoding that the Data uses (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Data to encrypt
Key to use
Is this a one time pad?

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Decrypts the data using a basic xor of the key (not very secure unless doing a one time pad)
member.param: Data to decrypt
Key to use
Is this a one time pad?
Encoding that the Data uses (defaults to UTF8)

member.name: M:Utilities.Encryption.ExtensionMethods.ShiftExtensions.XOr(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: XOrs two strings together, returning the result
member.param: Input string
Key to use
Encoding that the data uses (defaults to UTF8)
